channel.title: Joe Bogumsky on Veggie Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Joe Bogumsky on Veggie Guide

item.title: Vegan Activities: The Ultimate Beginners Guide to Bouldering
item.description: Veganism is about more than food alone. Animal products are used frequently in clothing, and sports equipment, amongst other things. This post is part of a series of vegan activity guides covering how to get started and practical ways to avoid the use of animal products. What is Bouldering? Bouldering is a form of rock climbing that does not use ropes, or harnesses and concentrates solely on movement on the rock.
